评论详情: The pair is pretty light, you barely feel them. Plan wearing them to work during the hotter seasons. I think its a good value for your money, hopefully i can use them for more than a year.

评论概述: Very nice and comfortable, but sizing is a complete mess see below for conversion reference
评论详情: The provided size chart is in the wrong format. The selectable options are actually in UK sizes, the received packaging will have the US sizes printed, and the shoes themselves use European sizes inside so convert the size options from UK size to your chosen size type for best fit. The heel-to-toe is completely incorrect so ignore it.  I ordered the size 8 and 9 to compare sizes because according to the size chart from heel-to-toe I should be a size 8, side note I'm usually a US size 9.5 which I would have ordered instead of the 9 for testing but it wasn't an option, which is why I got different sizes to see what worked. What I received however was sizes 9 and 9.5 according to the packaging but the sizes inside the shoes are in European sizes 42 and 43. The 43 fit perfectly and are very comfortably.  One star demotion for the confusing sizing issue, otherwise great shoe.

I bought these for work. They are durable, the rubber is great, they are comfortable. These are replacing my $100+ Vivobarefoot dress shoes. I already purchased a second pair, because I love them so much! Super valuable and they aren't heavy at all, they feel great on my feet! 100% recommend.
In sole is wedged and too thick.

评论概述: These shoes were not for me.
评论详情: I bought these shoes so that I comfortably slip them on and wear them on the farm as I am working.  They look to be comfortable, but I need more support for my feet than what these offer.  For example, I dig with a shovel fairly often and these did not have a sole that would support that effort.  I think they would be perfect for just relaxing around the farm in.  They simply just did not fit my needs so I returned them.
Muy bueno!!!!
These are very comfortable and look good. I should have gotten a size up, but these will do. Fast shipping too.
These are the most comfortable shoes I’ve bought in a long time. For someone who has wide feet these are perfect.
Pretty comfortable. Easy to slip on. breath well. The sole is a little hard and loud on hard flooring.

The only shoe I can find with a wide toe box in size 15, every other so called barefoot/minimalist shoe company has gone to a narrower toe box.  These are great, cheap, roomy, and comfortable. Why pay well over a $100 for vivo or the other name brands when those fall apart and have skinny toe boxes?  I hope they make some ankle boots or wintery high top shoes in 15 wide.
The wide toe box makes these shoes very comfortable for walking. If you’rea larger person or have wide feet I highly recommend these.

These shoes are absolutely comfortable! I’ve gone all out and replaced all my brand-name shoes with these no-name barefoot-style shoes. They might not be the most stylish, but as we get older, comfort takes precedence over style, right?

评论概述: No worth it for how long they lasted (weeks) even at this price
评论详情: I saw other reviews commenting on how fast the soles wear out.. I figured no big deal they are fairly minimalist anyway. What didn't know is the heal has a grid pattern molded into the sole. That grid cuts right through the sole in the heal area with in the first week of ownership.  How a few months in and I can't wear them without blisters.  Very poor design on the heel mold with sharp ridges makes these a dud unless you enjoy waffle blisters more than I did.

So I recently got turf toe (injured the tendon in my big toe), which caused pain when I walked. Realized I had wide feet, and that I had been wearing narrow/ too small shoes for years.  I got some wide Asics for running walking which offered some relief, but soon found I couldn't go back to any of my old shoes without pain. I liked the Asics, but I couldn't wear them everywhere. They're pretty much Dad shoes. 😅  So I bought these hoping to find something slightly more stylish to go out in. My expectations were pretty low at $25, but boy did these over deliver!  I pretty much never leave reviews, but these felt amazing as soon as I put them on. I got mine in a wide and they just felt delicious on my feet. Oh my God, so good. The toe box is perfect. Even better than my Asics. Definitely foot shaped.  Highly recommend!!

I switched to the wide toe zero drop shoes after developing dislocated big toes on both my feet. So glad I did. The shoes feel more natural than shoes that posses a drop like running shoes. Its tough to go back.  I also feel comfortable wearing the shoes in a business casual work environment.
Soft like slippers, accomodates narrow arch, wide toe box.

评论概述: A wide toe box makes a huge difference

These are wonderful shoes and very comfortable. Great for those of us with extra wide feet. Very lightweight.

Hey just wanted to say I've been wearing skeeters size 51W and they fit ok I have a bone deformity in my left foot so I can't wear 14 size but this shoe is roomier their is some space near the front but I can live with that since I have to go to a wedding soon but I will order the size 14 next time.

These are not the greatest for a lot of walking on hard surfaces or especially rocky surfaces as you will feel every rock stabbing your feet. Very light weight. Look decent. Not too expensive for what you get. The bottom soles are overly soft, could be made more rigid.  Really good for outside in the yard or on the beach etc. No arch support at all.

Just got the relxfeet Men's Oxfords Shoes, and I’m really impressed! The quality is great for the price, and they’re insanely comfortable—like wearing socks with a hard bottom. They’re perfect for everyday wear or just hanging out.  Heads up, though—they might not be the best for long walks if you’re not used to them. Totally worth it if you want stylish and comfy shoes without spending a fortune.
Great price for an affordable pair of good looking shoes. True to color and size for me. Super comfortable as well. The white treads do seem to get dirty quick though.

Felt great the very first time I wore them.

评论概述: These looked nice, but no support and too short

These shoes are as advertised. In hand, I’m not convinced they will hold up long. I don’t expect a thick sole, but this sole is very soft and squishy and doesn’t seem like it will hold up long. They are nice and wide. I typically wear a 10 or 10.5 as I like a little extra room. I’d say these are true to size.

These shoes are alright. Definitely easy on the width.  Comfortable, but no where near comfort of Skechers shoes. When I walk it's contact with the ground is flat-feeling. Kinda abrupt. Still, I'm glad I bought them. For the price it's a decent wide shoe.

Something about this just didn’t feel good to me, I had high hopes these would be a new replacement for a good slip on and go lightweight shoe but they just don’t feel comfy, the look cheap and I don’t really have anything to say about them. 评论概述: Very comfortable and stylish for the summer/warm weather.

These are my new favorite shoes. they're incredibly light weight, very breathable, surprisingly plush in all the right areas, and they look fantastic.  10/10 bought 3 pairs so far and plan to get more.

These are just regular shoes in "wide" sizes. There is a noticeable drop between heel and toe. There is not a wider toe box than a normal shoe. You have to take the inserts out for them to be anywhere close to bearable. The sole and upper are not as flexible as a barefoot shoe is meant to be. The sole is too thick and i can't feel the ground beneath my food. I can, however feel the harsh shape of the sole once the insert is removed.  This is not a good example of a barefoot shoe.
I like these! They are comfortable, while being dressier than walking around in tennis shoes. The style is such that they go well with jeans or with shorts.

评论概述: Comfy shoes with a different look
评论详情: PROs:  - Comfy removable gel insole - Breathable upper  OKs:  - Beware models with a white sole...easily stained - Sizing (11 wide) is as expected - Fairly lightweight (Size 11 is 11.4 oz per shoe) - Fairly nice 'squishy' laces (but 9" too long) - Heel tab (would prefer larger loop) - Ankle elastic - Workmanship seems pretty good  CONs:  - No major gripes  NIT PICKs:  - Rubbery soles can be squeaky and otherwise noisy (see Note 1) - Very wide in the toe...Area forward of laces puckers.  - - - Notes - - -  Note 1: Soles are soft, grippy rubber, but for some reason they have a louder 'clomp' than my other shoes, and give loud squeaks when skidding on a hard floor.
Shoes are okay. They look better in the pictures than they do in person but if you can find an outfit to wear with them, I would recommend them.

I really like the wide toe box of this shoe. I felt low to the ground in these but I was still comfortable. The appearance of these seems like they could be unisex. I'm still undecided if I'll pair these with shorts. They're very lightweight and breathable. I ordered true-to-size and have plenty of room.

I have been trying so hard to find comfortable dress shoes that are also functionable for walking, standing, etc. i’ve had chronic gout for the past seven years of my life and most shoes I wear that are dress shoes hurt my feet after 2 to 4 hours of walking or standing. These shoes by far mold to your feet are comfortable on my heels and have a wider tow box. They fit my feet perfectly they molded to my feet and you can wear these with no-show socks or no socks at all. And they feel fantastic. I’ve since purchased three additional colors in the same size. And hope they come out with more colors in the future. Because I will be buying them.

I've been toying with several shoes that have this wide-toe-box and added these to the list to try out, and I must say the look is different but it's not as drastically different as some others I own. The comfort is there too - I've probably worn them for a total of 24 hours now, 6 or 7 hours as a time, and they're great! They fit well, stay put and are decent to walk and run in - i would go jogging in them for exercise, but if you need to chase down a basketball or 5 yr old or something like that they're not uncomfortable or hazardous to sprint in. All in all I am pleased, especially given the price point. They look good, feel great and will look even better with some glow in the dark (or reflective) laces!
The feel and fit are great

评论概述: Nice shoes but the size can be difficult to match
评论详情: Nice shoes, but the sizing is difficult to determine.  Assume they're true to size and not like the other brands that come up short.

I got these for my husband to wear during traveling, since I figured they would be easy to pack. They are fairly comfortable and very lightweight. I just wouldn't recommend them for when you are on your feet a lot or doing a lot of walking.

The shoes are sized just about right.  Mine are wide.  They are just a tad short - maybe half a size, but the width is pretty good.  The material is breathable and synthetic.  The soles are not very thick, and you can feel rocks under you, but they are not uncomfortable.  There is enough room in the shoes to use an aftermarket insole, which you will need if you have high arches.These shoes were a little disfigured upon arrival, but after wearing for about two days, the dents fell out.  The first day I wore them, I believe I put about 10 thousands steps in them.  No blisters, but I could feel the front of the shoes hitting my toenails.  There was no pain though.I have since worn them primarily in an office environment, but live in the desert.  These shoes do OK off the beaten path, but are not designed for rough terrain.  I think the looks are meh, but they are not ugly.  Because of the wide width, they kind of look like clown shoes in shape but I have short wide feet.I think they are worth the price but if you order them you might want to go up half a size.  So far they have held up well and still look like new after weeks of wearing them.  There is also no noticeable wear so far.  If you like to walk about barefoot like I do, I believe these shoes will be to your liking.  I have arthritis, and these shoes have not made it worse like other shoes have.  For an office setting, they should be fine, just no hiking!

These may be the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. They are a bit wide in toe area so it gives them a unique look. If your looking for a simple pair of shoes to kick around in these are perfect. Stretch sof material with a rugged rubber bottom makes these a great fit!

These shoes are very comfortable for this woman with a wide foot. I know they are men’s shoes, but they fit me better than a woman’s shoe. I have just started wearing “barefoot” type shoes. My daughter (who wears this type shoe all the time) said they looked and felt good to her. They are certainly more affordable than name brands. They have a padded insole which some “barefoot” aficionados might not like but I sure do. And the insoles are removable.

评论概述: Hubby is happy with these on his feet
评论详情: Hubby said they are soft and provide all-day comfort. They look nice for the office and have the comfort for running errands. The wide fit, for his wide feet, provides plenty of toe room without feeling like floppy clown shoes.

评论概述: Light weight wide size comfortable sneakers for many uses
评论详情: I like wide size shoes and I found this pair.  It is lightweight and comfortable wearing it at home or shopping or walking or even going to the office.  The wide size and its low profile allows the toes to spread out more naturally and it gives the bare feet walking feeling.  I have not tried it for a longer outdoor walk on bike trails, will try that and may report back.  One thing I like to see is how durable and long lasting it is.

Relxfeet Casual Oxfords have a sophisticated, comfortable style. Termed as barefoot, zero-drop, and wide-toe box, they allow unrestricted natural foot movement. A definite change of pace from wearing sneakers, these shoes provide improved comfort while enjoying non-strenuous activities. I can almost feel the sand between my toes. The soft knit mesh fabric uppers are a type of synthetic canvas. They blend well into the lightweight rubber soles, allowing enough room and minimal stress on the top of the toes and feet. These well-made Oxfords are durable and reasonably priced. As the Relxfeet product line expands, a suggested preference would be an option that includes all-natural uppers made of cotton or linen canvas.

These shoes are "squishy" and comfortable.  The stretchy material makes it feel basically like wearing socks with soles on them, which I like. The padding in the heel/ankle part is a nice touch, too. The only thing I would mention, as it can be a deal breaker for some, is there is little to no arch support so need to consider that if that is an issue for you.
These shoes are pretty comfortable. Im a big fan of barefoot style shoes and I am on my feet all day at work, and so far, these have held up great. I've gotten some compliments on them s well.

These Sneakers are a fantastic combination of comfort and style. The wide toe box provides ample room for my toes to move freely, making them perfect for all-day wear.  Despite their business casual appearance, they feel versatile for both professional and casual occasions.  Overall, these shoes are a great investment if you're looking for comfort without sacrificing style

First the good stuff, they are light weight and eventually they felt comfortable.  Now the bad stuff; the size runs small.  Get a half size larger than you normally wear.  They are far from business casual, they are a fabric type sneaker.  The photo shows laces but what it doesn't show is you must tie the laces.  There doesn't seem to be much support, I feel like I am leaning backwards when wearing them.  Not sure how long they would hold up if you wore them daily.  Fashion Oxfords?  Far from it.More good stuff;  After wearing for a couple of hours the falling backward feeling went away.  Not sure I would wear on a daily basis but they might be nice for travel or to put in a backpack to carry an extra light weight pair of shoes.  The soles grip well, almost too well.  if you tend to not fully pick up your foot or shuffle your feet when you walk, there's a chance they will grip to tight and you might fall.  So don't buy these for your grandpa or grandma if they don't have a proper gait.
I feel like they ran a bit small. Also wasnt a fan of design on bottom that looked like a foot.

I transitioned to "barefoot" shoes a year ago now and own several pairs.  These have more cushion than your typical barefoot shoe, but they do still afford the zero drop and of course the wide toebox.  They are flexible and the soles have good enough grip that I can use them on my boat deck without worry.  They are attractive and don't have the "clown shoe" look nearly as much as other barefoot shoes.  The look is casual and pairs well with jeans or shorts.  The fabric is breathable and a bit stretchy, and seems like it will wash well.  These don't seem like expensive shoes, but they are nicer than the price would indicate.  If you are looking to try barefoot shoes and don't want to break the bank, these are a good option to get your feet wet.  They are comfortable and will allow your toes to splay in the natural position, and the zero drop will help alleviate back problems.  Recommended.

Put on these shoes and wore them for 12+ hours. Super comfortable from the first moment, and has a wide toe box, so your feet and toes have room to move. Underneath your feet, the insole has a bit of memory foam. I also receive compliments for the look of these.

I like the width since I usually go around wearing Teva flip-flops.  I think they look nice.The description reads like you don't need socks.  They fit great with bare feet. But the innersole doesn't look like something you would toss into the washing machine.  With socks, my feet don't get sweaty but I think I should have gone up a size.  Use the sizing chart while wearing socks.They are very light with good padding.  You can feel the ground but you are protected from grass burrs.  The soles have great traction.  I like.  A lot.Added:  After a few trips to the grocery store with and without socks, while they feel good barefoot, I'm going with "wear socks".

As a vine contributor I’ve learned not to get my hopes up with certain types of items; shoes being one of them. When these shoes first arrived they looked like they would be huge on me. I ordered a 10 wide, even though I don’t have wide feet wide is all that the shoe comes in.  They showed up as a size 43, which is closer to 9.5 US, but knowing these were ‘barefoot’ type sneakers I lucked out. 43 is what I wore in FiveFingers, the last barefoot shoes I purchased. I tried them on and found that not only did they fit really well but they were exceedingly comfortable.  The shoes look nice, have padding in the right places without getting in the way of the barefoot aspect. Truth be told I’m not sure how long these will hold up. They don’t seem cheap but they don’t exactly scream quality either.  But for $30, a comfortable pair of casual sneakers that look nice enough to be worn anywhere from around the house to a Sunday brunch with a pair of khakis.  If you’re looking for inexpensive comfortable casual sneakers, and you don’t like the support of regular sneakers and prefer barefoot style, I actually recommend that you check these out.  I almost didn’t buy these, but I’m really glad I did. And a note on sizing, being barefoot style if you’re a half size shoe I’d recommend sizing down.

The Men's Dress Sneakers Fashion Oxfords Business Casual Shoes with a Wide Toe Box, Barefoot Walking Shoes, and Zero Drop design cater to a specific niche within the footwear market, blending style with comfort and functionality. Here's a review based on these key features:  Style: These shoes offer a fusion of formal and casual aesthetics, making them versatile for various occasions. The Oxfords design provides a classic touch suitable for business attire, while the sneaker-inspired elements add a contemporary flair. The ability to transition seamlessly from work to leisure makes them appealing for individuals seeking a versatile footwear option.  Comfort: The wide toe box design accommodates natural foot splay, which can enhance comfort, especially for individuals with broader feet or those who prefer ample toe room. Additionally, the barefoot walking aspect promotes a more natural gait and foot movement, potentially reducing strain and discomfort during extended wear.  Functionality: The zero-drop construction ensures that the heel and forefoot are at the same level, mimicking a barefoot-like experience. This design feature is favored by those who prioritize foot alignment and posture. The shoes' ability to provide a stable base without elevating the heel excessively can contribute to better overall body mechanics, particularly for individuals prone to foot or back issues.  Materials and Durability: The durability of these shoes depends on the quality of materials used in their construction. High-quality leather or synthetic materials can enhance longevity, ensuring that the shoes withstand regular wear and tear. Additionally, factors such as stitching quality and sole construction contribute to overall durability and performance.  Fit and Sizing: While the wide toe box is designed to accommodate a range of foot shapes, ensuring a proper fit is essential for optimal comfort and support. Customers may need to consider their usual sizing and any specific fitting recommendations provided by the manufacturer to determine the most suitable size for their feet.  Price: The price of these shoes may vary depending on factors such as brand reputation, materials used, and additional features offered. Customers should consider their budget and the value proposition offered by the shoes concerning their quality, comfort, and style.  Overall, Men's Dress Sneakers Fashion Oxfords Business Casual Shoes with a Wide Toe Box, Barefoot Walking Shoes, and Zero Drop design appeal to individuals seeking a balance between style, comfort, and functionality. They provide a unique combination of formal aesthetics with features aimed at promoting natural foot movement and comfort, making them a compelling choice for those prioritizing both fashion and foot health. However, personal preferences regarding style, fit, and budget will ultimately influence purchasing decisions.
